participant_1.background:
I do laundry about once a week.
i just graduated high school with honors.
i m the youngest of five.
I took George to the park for a picnic and we played fetch.
I treasure my computer because it's how I make my music.

participant_2.background:
I love Halloween because it is the only time of year when I can dress up and be someone else.
my wife is a breast cancer survivor.
i enjoy comedies.
and , my best friend is abigail.
I want to find a way to keep my curly hair in place.

content.text: Hello, I'm new to the area and would love to meet new people. How about you?
I'm always up for meeting new people! What are some of your interests?
I just graduated high school with honors and I love to write music. I also enjoy playing fetch with my dog, George.
Oh, that's wonderful! I'm a huge fan of Halloween and I also enjoy comedies. What's your favorite thing about writing music?
I love the way I can express myself through my music. It's a great way to let out my emotions and connect with other people.
I can definitely relate to that. I love being able to escape into a different world when I'm watching a comedy.
Oh, that's great! What's your favorite comedy movie?
That's a tough question, but I think I'd have to say "The Princess Bride." It's just so funny and heartwarming.
I've never seen that movie, but I've heard good things about it. I'll have to check it out sometime.
You definitely should! It's a classic for a reason.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
You're welcome! It was nice talking to you.
You too! Have a nice day!
